I want to help anyone i can , I'm actually here, no to get money back but to help those how might not have the Financial abilities as myself. If u have any questions or comments or just want to talk, feel free to email me, anytime. I would love to meet people on here and make "SMALL TEAMS". I'm not into making a huge 100 person team, i want it personable. Were everyone in the team is just that a team. If the rich, the powerful, won't change or help the world let us do it.

lenders.name: kccdo
lenders.loan_because: we are Serving The Villages in Uganda!
lenders.occupational_info:
KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION May 

BACKGROUND:
KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION (KCCDO), started way buck in 2007, wit vision of helping all the disadvantaged in the community,with knowledge and skills to lead equality of life.

 

 

 

KCCDO.is a registered organization by Community based organization(CBO),under the registered number CD-030-2009.

VISION:
Is to reach out all the community members of the different categories ie orphans, widows, women,youth, single mothers, grandmothers, school-drop-outs,care givers,elderly people and all that living with HIV/AIDS ,poor families,

 

 

 

 

 

MAJOR OBJECTIVES:
To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.

 Skills Training Program 
COMMUNITY VOCATIONAL CENTER,
VISION;
IS to promote peoples talents  &giving them skills for successful in life.

MISSION;

To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.

MOTTO;

IN GOD  WE TRUST.

COURSES PROVIDED;

-TAILORING COURSES, THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,

-KNITTING COURSES,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,

-HAIR DRESSING COURSES,THIS TAKES ONLY 1 YEAR

-SALOON MANAGEMENT,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR

-HAND-CRAFT COURSES,THIS TAKE 1 YEAR

AFTER THE COMPLETION OF THE COURSE  WE ARE WARDING A CERTIFICATE, FOR OUR TRAINEES.

TARGETED PEOPLE,

-WIDOWS
-WOMEN
-YOUTH
-SINGLE MOTHERS
-SCHOOL-DROP OUTS,
-ORPHANS
-HIV/AIDS AFFECTED,

YOU CAN JOIN US BY HELPING THIS NEEDY COMMUNITY MEMBERS WHO ARE IN NEED OF THE SKILLS, THROUGH YOUR DONATIONS,OR ANY ,OF THE FOLLOWING

NEEDS,

WE NEED 25 SEWING MACHINES.
WE NEED 5KNITTING MACHINES,
WE  NEED SALOON EQUIPMENTS,
WE NEED 25 COMPUTER MACHINES,
WE NEED 5 CARPENTRY TOOL- BOXES,
WE NEED 2 WELDING MACHINES(GRINDERS)


IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION OR need to be part  orCOMMENT YOU CAN CONTACT US ON .
TEL, +256,256,774530836/+256,785699626,
EMAIL, kccdo@yahoo.com





LOCATION:
(KCCDO) is located on guru road kasaala village luweero sub county luweero district
TEL: +256,774530836
EMAIL:kccdo@yahoo.com
site,http://kccdo.multiply.com/
CONTACT PERSON: Ibrahim Lubega.

lenders.name: Jerod
lenders.loan_because: I'm not sure of the exact quote, but give a man a fish, he eats for a day, show him how to fish, he eats for a lifetime.  To carry the metaphor further, I see this as a movement to enable that man or woman to buy the fishing pole.  I think micro loans are a nonpartisan and potentially permanent solution to assisting people out of poverty situations.

lenders.name: Wilfried

lenders.name: Ayn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people by giving them opportunities, motivation, and training (but not  handouts!). I admire all these entrepreneurs and want them to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. government and, even when the bureaucracy frustrates me, I still believe we are making a positive difference in this world. Outside of my "job" my "work" includes mentoring a teenager in foster care (www.kidsave.org), coaching kids with special needs (www.keengreaterdc.org), and teaching leadership to teenagers (www.ayf.com).

lenders.name: Vecchio Memorial
lenders.occupation: Bob was a Professor and SMA Fellow
lenders.loan_because:
A prodigious business scholar, Vecchio published numerous articles in the Journal of Applied Psychology, the Academy of Management Journal, the Academy of Management Review, Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes, Personnel Psychology, the Journal of Management, the Journal of Organizational Behavior, and Leadership Quarterly.  He also served on the editorial boards of the Academy of Management Review, the Academy of Management Learning & Education Journal, the Journal of Management, Leadership Quarterly, the Journal of Occupational and Organizational Psychology, Group and Organization Management, Employee Responsibilities and Rights Journal, and other journals. 

Vecchio was a fellow of the American Psychological Association, the Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology, the Southern Management Association, and the American Psychological Society.
lenders.occupational_info: This memorial initially created on behalf of the Southern Management Association Fellows

lenders.name: Natalie

lenders.occupational_info: Investigate computer crime on behalf of my company.

lenders.name: jackie
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do to try to help some of the less fortunate in the world to gain self respect and be productive in their communities - we've all needed a "hand-up" at times
lenders.occupational_info: it's been very gratifying over the 65 years - just helping people

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I lend (loan is a noun) to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Volunteer with Grameen Foundation's "Bankers without Borders" program.  Founder: Community Development Banker Corps

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is a more useful way to invest my money, and i will get it back eventually anyways, so why not throw some cash where it can be used, and if i loose some, no big deal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 16 and in high school

lenders.name: Dipika
lenders.loan_because: I like to think that I could make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to make a tangible and visible difference in the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Management classes to grade 12 students in Mexico!

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give something back.

lenders.name: Susan T.
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for all I have and wish to help others in their work.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: support small businesses specially to people who want a better life
lenders.occupational_info: have a full time job in order to pay for my studies....i'm on the same boat as you

lenders.name: Ulises
lenders.loan_because: I'm just too fortunate to be living in a rich country.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: It's within my means and it means a great deal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and videographer.

lenders.name: Pip
lenders.loan_because: By donating a relatively small amount of money, we can make a huge difference to someone's life. And because at various times in our own lives, we've all appreciated a helping hand...

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We Care

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to support the efforts of those who work hard to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach men and women about how politics and government function in the United States.

lenders.name: Patrick & Nadia
lenders.loan_because: We are doing our part for a better, harmonious, sharing and respectful world.
lenders.occupational_info: Patrick works in a laboratory at a large Biotechnology company. I develop testing kits that screen food for dangerous bacteria. Nadia is a writer and an active volunteer in the community

lenders.name: Lynne Polischuik
lenders.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things easier for everyone to use. I help companies and organizations to empathize and communicate with their users.

lenders.name: Nema
lenders.loan_because: it helps everyone.

lenders.name: MattandRubinah
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of my money working rather than just sitting in a bank.
lenders.occupational_info: One of the best jobs in the world.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help others whenever possible. I hope that when I need a loan that there will be a source where I can get one.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize and file legal documents.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me the gift of giving for my birthday and opened my eyes to a great program.

lenders.name: Anais
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the microfinance industry for a company that investments in MFIs and other financial and social inclusion initiatives.

lenders.name: Van
lenders.loan_because: it supports entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Decoteau
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone on our planet is connected.

lenders.name: porschia
lenders.loan_because: want others to be given a chance and to improve the quality of lives

lenders.name: Tom Coombs
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to receive opportunities in my life, it's time to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small IT consultancy providing IP Telephony and contact center solutions

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves something in life and everyone should give something back to help others if more people were given help the world would be a better place.I love to see people prosper and dreams become reallity.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange golf holidays for people.

lenders.name: Alfred
lenders.loan_because: we all can use a little help.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others. A friend sent me a gift certificate and alerted me to this organization, and I am glad that she did!
lenders.occupational_info: Being an accountant, I keep track of the financial transactions in businesses of my clients, and help those clients comply with American tax laws by correctly classifying income and expense and preparing income tax forms that are sent to the government. I'm also a mother, wife, and a graduate student.

lenders.name: Marcia - USA
lenders.loan_because: I want other's lives to be blessed, through access to opportunities.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a political science major at Carleton College in Northfield, Minnesota.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be successful, there are so many people who have the ability but are never given the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop websites for all types of people from individuals to large businesses. I also work with charities and social groups.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at their dreams, no matter their financial situation, money should never be an obstacle to live out your dreams, and do better for yourself and family.
lenders.occupational_info: I help place doctor's into our hospital by ensuring they are good and reliable doctors.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make events happen.

lenders.name: Deborah and Derek
lenders.loan_because: microcredit is the best possible method of charitable giving.  Not only does it provide an opportunity for those wishing to make a better life for themselves, it doesn't function as a "handout" as most charities do.  The onus of success in on the lendee, and the results are often spectacular.
lenders.occupational_info: Deborah is the Director of Evaluation for a local mental health agency in the Cincinnati area.  Her job entails program improvement and outcome monitoring.  Derek is a Ph.D. student in the Criminal Justice Division at the University of Cincinnati.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I can!!

lenders.name: Toan
lenders.loan_because: I loan therefore I am. :)
lenders.occupational_info: My research is in macroeconomic policies and economic development. Fight poverty with love!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: We're all here now.  We're all here together.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a high school history teacher; a world traveler; and an empathizer and lover of all.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: The money comes so easily for me and the thought that it could help others brings me joy.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a daily surprise and learning experience.  I work with kind and dedicated people and serve physicians who recognize the value of high quality evidence to guide their decisions.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I feel that i can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an emergency Medical Technician.  I provide emergency medical care to those in need.

lenders.name: Artgrunt
lenders.occupational_info: Eye candy!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I currently am a stay at home dad looking to start a business from home. I am in a situation riht now where my 2 year old son was abused and neglected now i am trying to get full custody.

lenders.name: Teresa and Danny
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a better, more efficient and more productive way of helping people than just giving money to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Kiva reaches their lenders through their website--it's a communication tool.  I create websites for my clients to communicate with their clients and customers.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance has the power to change the world for good.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: As a woman, I want to support, encourage and empower other women in the world.  I believe in them!  Line upon line, precept upon precept, one by one, each of us can make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a professional photographer.  I get to be passionately creative doing what I love.  I am also a mother of five children who are my pride and joy.
